title: Check Out Your League Of Legends Radio Station

embed.description: Abys Radio is a league of legends radio station dedicated to the league of legends community. The radio is online 24/7 and has great entertainment whilst you play your league of legends games.

body: You should check out your league of legends radio station by going to: http://www.abysradio.com

replies.body:
I'm downloading quicktime right now to listen because the browser player is too quiet even at max settings (I'd blow my ears off if I got a notification from something else)
EDIT: Oh odd RIGHT after I download the installer it works completely, I haven't even used it yet

DOUBLE EDIT: The auto DJ has an... interesting choice in songs... ~~rammus~~ Rammstein - Pussy???
Really cool, upvoting ^_^ If you haven't yet put it on reddit
